pageContext.associations: Other objects from the 3rd Grotto include Beaker ware, necklaces of Callais beads + a large spool shaped bead with V-perforation.
pageContext.publications: E. Cartailhac, Ages Prehistoriques, Fig. 182,Aberg, Civiln. Eneol. Iberique, Fig. 76.1,V.G. Childe, Dawn of European Civilization (1925), pp. 11-8, Fig. 57, 2; scale erroneously given as "1/2"; actually less than 1/2,Also Peake and Fessure[?], Merchant Venturers in Bronze, fig. 5 c, p. 17.
pageContext.site: Portugal,Estnemadura Transtagana,Palmella,Casal Parolo,Quinta do Anjo,3rd Grotto (Furna)
pageContext.remarks: Cf. large bone pin from Casa da Moura, Cescarda (Catailhac, Fig. 116) with spatulate head.
